af335306-e553-4152-9586-069c0fa136c9.name: 战斗反射
af335306-e553-4152-9586-069c0fa136c9.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

1c3cff59-54e9-47df-be87-abbef8f6461b.name: 健康
1c3cff59-54e9-47df-be87-abbef8f6461b.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

b1ceeec5-b200-4b91-a4e5-2cd0f1e7f602.name: Fit, Very
b1ceeec5-b200-4b91-a4e5-2cd0f1e7f602.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

2dfab217-0d99-408c-acdf-8405b7386b5f.name: 高痛阈
2dfab217-0d99-408c-acdf-8405b7386b5f.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

e9896285-d182-4895-8f8b-c9a2f9267c5d.name: 影响人群
e9896285-d182-4895-8f8b-c9a2f9267c5d.notes: 几乎所有人，刨去@一大群人@

0ed658f4-0825-49d5-8797-bb27b7dccd48.name: 期待陪伴
0ed658f4-0825-49d5-8797-bb27b7dccd48.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

099a540e-be6f-4ed2-bf18-87acf8cf97e0.name: 范围：任何与你不同的人

facc83e4-82e0-4c2e-a43b-097613ebdbd6.name: 自负
facc83e4-82e0-4c2e-a43b-097613ebdbd6.notes: 如果 GM 认为人物过于谨慎，可能要求人物进行自我控制检定，如果检定失败，人物不再畏缩不前，就像你能解决问题一样！

features.situation: 来自年青幼稚的人，他们相信你的吹牛
